name: PSO2NGS Mod Manager
description: Added new mods adding feature with auto sort by item name using item reference sheets (item's icon will be added later)
Reference sheets will also be auto updated if there are changes to them (needed for the new adder to work correctly)
Added sort categories feature, can be sorted by name, or item count
Checksum will be auto downloaded when user clicked on checksum missing button
Some bug fixes and other optimization
